text: Nabiyow ku Rabbi Aadam xaylo ken abbobtih xiironwak ken Samad (cawad) yeyyeeqeeh isi inkittinaanel yaamineenimil ken Nafsil sumaq keenik bee waqdi cusey, anu sin Rabbi hinniyoo? keenik axcuk, tokkel oggoleeniih yeey atu Ni Rabbi kinnitoomuh Sumaaqitnah iyyen, anu sin Nafsil sin kah Sumaaqisem Qhiyaamah ayr√≥ diggah nanu tama xaganak garcit suge mara kinnino ittaanamak
